channel.title: Algorithms on Codeless Code
channel.description: Recent content in Algorithms on Codeless Code

item.title: String Deduplication on the Type Level
item.description: Solving the classic string deduplication algorithm entirely within TypeScript’s type system using literal string types and recursive type manipulation.

item.title: Dijkstra's Shunting Yard in Typescript
item.description: A functional TypeScript implementation of Dijkstra’s classic algorithm for parsing mathematical expressions, converting infix notation to reverse Polish notation for stack-based evaluation.

item.title: Pythagorean Triple Problem in Sub-linear Time
item.description: We explore a solution to finding Pythagorean triples with a product constraint, achieving O(âˆšn) time complexity by reducing the problem to the well-known 3SUM problem.
